title: Does LUMS Lahore have transfer programs to foreign universities? - Quora

response.answer_text: LUMS have agreements with quite a few universities abroad for exchange programs, if thats what you are referring at. To name a few countries that I am aware of, one is Japan and the other is Austria. Both these exchange programs, if selected for, are fully paid. Moreover, you can get detailed info regarding exchange programs with other partner universities over the globe by visiting the Office of Student Affairs (OSA) or their website.
